title: Executive Order 2018-Relating to Postal Crimes in the Canal Zone
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me, I hereby establish the following order for the Canal Zone:

Section 1. The Postal Laws and Regulations of the United States, not locally inapplicable, which define crimes against the Postal Service, and prescribe punishments therefor, are hereby extended to the Canal Zone, and shall be enforceable in the courts of the Canal Zone in the manner and form prescribed for other criminal cases by the Canal Zone laws.
Section 2. This order shall take effect from and after this date.
citation: Woodrow Wilson, Executive Order 2018-Relating to Postal Crimes in the Canal Zone Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/275252
